synonyms.synonym: Leucine-rich repeat and sterile alpha motif-containing protein 1

protein.specific_function: E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase that mediates monoubiquitination of TSG101 at multiple sites, leading to inactivate the ability of TSG101 to sort endocytic (EGF receptors) and exocytic (HIV-1 viral proteins) cargos
